EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Uniform Shop Rosinka Temporarily Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Uniform Shop Rosinka Temporarily Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please note that the uniform shop at the Rosinka campus will be closed tomorrow, Thursday, as well as Friday due to new stock arrival.
The uniform shop will be open on Saturday and Sunday, the 30th and 31st, from 10 am until 5 pm, but closed on Monday and Tuesday, September 1 & 2. We will reopen on Wednesday, 3rd September, 8 am. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience.
Regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
